metadata.synopsis: Refugee at entrance to WYR south checkpoint. Trying to get in, but having issues with guards checking documents.

0.speaker: Noira Crysst
0.text: I don't know what to do. There's nowhere else to go.

1.speaker: Noira Crysst
1.text: We can't get in. I - I have family here. They said we'd be welcome.
